title: The Virgin Shall Be With Child
itunes:title: The Virgin Shall Be With Child
description: The fourth and final Isaian image for this Advent season is the most powerful and the most mysterious: the virgin shall be with child. Never underestimate what God can do. As the angel said to Mary, "nothing is impossible with God." Even from our emptiness, God can bring forth salvation.
